Title: ['ABCL']
Selftext: $ABCL got hit with analyst downgrades, watch out for upcoming dips from this news
Upvote: Everything is right with [AbCellera](https://abcellera.com), great fundamentals, great team, had awful financials until an [incredible report on Monday](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/abcellera-reports-full-2020-business-200500028.html) Everyone knows analyst ratings are bullshit, despite [news](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/abcellera-gilead-sciences-announce-multi-130000943.html) on a multi-year contract with Gilead today, $ABCL got hit with financial downgrades by analysts pushing the price down. I'm just saying, the coming few days might be great entry points if you want to get into this stock. It's being pushed down simply because a few analysts said it won't do as well financially this year.
